booking.title: Book easily & enjoy the magic of Colombia’s Coffee Region
booking.p1: Planning your next adventure has never been this easy! At Ruta Xplorer, we help you book your experiences in a fast, flexible, and secure way. To secure your spot on any of our tours through the Cocora Valley and the Coffee Region, you only need to make your booking on the day you prefer.
booking.p2: At Ruta Xplorer, we make booking your activities a simple and flexible process, so you can plan your trip stress-free and with total peace of mind.
booking.p3: We accept payments in Colombian Pesos, so you can enjoy without hassle no matter where you visit from. With Ruta Xplorer, booking your activities becomes an easy and reliable process designed so you only focus on what matters most: living an unforgettable experience in the heart of Colombia’s Coffee Region.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.reservasPagosText: Bookings are confirmed upon full payment through our secure payment gateway. The amount paid guarantees service availability on the selected date.
terms.cancelacion1: Cancellations made more than 48 hours in advance may be rescheduled without penalty or refunded.
terms.cancelacion2: In case of refund, 14% of the total paid amount will be deducted for transaction and administrative costs.
terms.cancelacion3: Cancellations made less than 48 hours in advance or no-shows on the day of the tour are non-refundable.
terms.cancelacion4: If the service cannot be carried out due to weather conditions or causes beyond the company's control, rescheduling or a future-use voucher will be offered.
terms.responsabilidadText: We guarantee quality and safety in our operations. We are not responsible for loss of personal belongings or delays caused by force majeure. By making the purchase, the client declares having read and accepted these terms and conditions.
